","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d27rm","text":"How to prevent overloading, how to decide on indexes(too many and writes get slow, too few and reads get slow), how to keep latency down, etc","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"ajk89","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"2r6kd","text":"If you have such a document, could you please share a link.
